function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Positive samples from isolation rooms indicate potential spread of the virus to other areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Toilet identified as the most contaminated environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of viral particles in bathroom surfaces and aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of hands during toilet usage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Generation of bio-aerosols in drainage stacks after toilet flushing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination and spread of viruses in the toilet area due to shared use by multiple patients, potentially leading to a higher risk of infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High transfer rate of viruses from smooth to rough surfaces may contribute to contamination in the toilet area.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of positive samples in the toilet area and potential presence of sars-cov-2 in patient stool samples present an increased risk of viral spread in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Leakage of aerosols from isolation rooms to the corridor","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of weakly positive virus in corridor air and on exhaust grilles","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indoor air-temperature and relative humidity within a range favorable for microbial growth.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-standardized data collection and terminology","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Timely generation and
